name: Hello world!
tagline: Just another graphic designer. Or am I?
body:
My name is Ana Sardo and I am a young graphic designer from Aveiro, Portugal. 
Aside from graphic and editorial design, I also have a strong passion for photography and illustration.
I am currently getting my MA in Graphic and Editorial Design, at the Faculty of Fine Arts of the University of Porto.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
